section.name: JPATTERN-GWT: everything you need to implement the MVP architecture with GWT and restful
section.p:
This project manage most of the complexity in the development of a MVP architecture when you want to use a pure restful server side.
GWT is used only a compile time to generate the client javascript. No dependency on GWT libraries are present at runtime.
The framework lives around the concept of "event". Every user action triggers a specific event.
